sen.j: 天文博士（てんもんはかせ）は、古代日本の律令制において、陰陽寮に属した官職。
sen.e: Tenmon hakase is a government post belonging to onmyoryo in the ritsuryo system of the ancient times in Japan.
Tenmon hakase was a government post belonging to onmyoryo in the ritsuryo system of ancient Japan.
Tenmon hakase was a government post belonging to Onmyoryo (Bureau of Divination) in the ritsuryo system of ancient Japan.

sen.j: 定員は１名で正七位下相当。
sen.e: The fixed number of people was one who was equivalent to shoshichiinoge (Senior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade).
The status was equivalent to shoshichiinoge (Senior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade), and only a limited number of people who could hold such a position.
The status was equivalent to shoshichiinoge (Senior Seventh Rank, Lower Grade), and only one person could hold this a position at a time.

sen.j: 陰陽寮は陰陽道・暦道・天文道の三道から成るが、天文博士はそのうちの天文道の教官である。
sen.e: Onmyoryo was consisted of three subjects, onmyodo, rekido and tenmondo, and tenmon hakase was the teacher of tenmondo.
Onmyoryo consisted of three subjects--onmyodo, rekido and tenmondo--and tenmon hakase was the teacher of tenmondo.
Onmyoryo consisted of three subjects--onmyodo (yin-yang philosophy), rekido (learning of the calendar) and tenmondo (ancient horoscopy)--and tenmon hakase was the teacher of tenmondo.
sen.cmt: 陰陽道・暦道・天文道 の説明補足

sen.j: 天文博士の職掌は、天体を観察し異変があればその吉凶を占って密封して奏聞する（これを天文密奏という）こと、及び天文生に天体を観察し吉凶を占う方法を教えることだった。
sen.e: Tenmon hakase observed the astronomical object and reported the fortune telling which was sealed if there was any unusual event (it is called tenmon misso) and also taught the students the way of fortune telling by astronomical observation.

Tenmon hakase observed the celestial bodies and reported in fortune-telling, which was sealed if there was any unusual event (it's called tenmon misso), and also taught the students the way of fortune-telling through astronomical observation.

sen.j: 平安時代中期に賀茂保憲が安倍晴明に天文道を伝えて以後、天文博士の職も阿倍氏の世襲になった。
sen.e: In the middle of Heian period, since KAMO no Yasunori taught tenmondo to ABE no Seimei, tenmon hakase became also a hereditary post of the Abe clan.

sen.j: 天文密奏の詳細は、仁安 (日本)元年（1166年）に奏上された陰陽助賀茂泰親・天文博士安倍業俊の連署の二十数通の天文密奏を集成した『安倍泰親朝臣記』で見ることができる。
